医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了急诊室约束使用的种族和民族差异一项新的研究为越来越多的证据提供了更多数据，证明急诊室 (ED) 约束使用的差异，该研究已发表在学术急诊医学 (AEM) 一月号上，该杂志是学术协会的同行评审期刊急诊医学（SAEM）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-reveals-disparities-in-emergency-department-restraint-use-by-race-and-ethnicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-reveals-disparities-in-emergency-department-restraint-use-by-race-and-ethnicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86bd9ff6-a356-4a36-a7ed-b8f8661b7c57 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:52:27 -0500 Study reveals disparities in emergency department restraint use by race and ethnicity
蒙大拿州扩大疫苗宗教豁免的努力引发政治僵局蒙大拿州立法者与该州卫生部门就儿童保育许可规则的一揽子彻底改革陷入僵局，其中包括一项有争议的条款，允许宗教豁免儿童和工人的常规疫苗接种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Montanae28099s-effort-to-expand-religious-exemptions-to-vaccines-prompts-political-standoff.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Montanae28099s-effort-to-expand-religious-exemptions-to-vaccines-prompts-political-standoff.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=532bd855-44d1-417d-8e61-be825b5e6acd Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:00:02 -0500 Montana’s effort to expand religious exemptions to vaccines prompts political standoff
通过纳米载体输送的新型口服胰岛素可能很快就会取代注射胰岛素全球约有 4.25 亿人患有糖尿病。其中大约有 7500 万人每天注射胰岛素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-oral-insulin-delivered-via-nano-carriers-could-soon-replace-injections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-oral-insulin-delivered-via-nano-carriers-could-soon-replace-injections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0221353-f458-4d23-b856-870d50652037 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:32:41 -0500 New oral insulin delivered via nano-carriers could soon replace injections
揭示印迹巩固和记忆细化的细胞机制想一想您在短时间内有两次不同但相似的经历的经历。也许您在同一周内参加了两次假日聚会或在工作中进行了两次演讲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Unveiling-the-cellular-mechanisms-of-engram-consolidation-and-memory-refinement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Unveiling-the-cellular-mechanisms-of-engram-consolidation-and-memory-refinement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28d46e3f-6161-4aae-b8a1-8551716a447c Fri, 19 Jan 2024 12:09:34 -0500 Unveiling the cellular mechanisms of engram consolidation and memory refinement
突破性研究确定 FAM3C 是乳腺癌进展的关键调节因子UNIST 生物科学系 Jiyoung Park 教授及其研究团队进行的一项开创性研究发现，FAM3C（一种由癌症相关脂肪细胞 (CAA) 产生的代谢调节信号分子）是乳腺癌进展的关键调节因子。肿瘤微环境（TME）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Groundwriting-study-identizes-FAM3C-as-a-key-regulator-of-breast-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Groundwriting-study-identizes-FAM3C-as-a-key-regulator-of-breast-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a503e91e-cd3f-4278-8425-2ea4082ccf14 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:58:52 -0500 Groundbreaking study identifies FAM3C as a key regulator of breast cancer progression
研究分析了组织不可知疗法在原发性脑肿瘤患者中的应用南佛罗里达浸信会健康中心迈阿密癌症研究所的研究人员今天在《癌症趋势》杂志上发表了一项研究，分析了组织不可知疗法在原发性脑肿瘤 (PBT) 患者中的使用情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-analyzes-the-use-of-tissue-agnostic-therapeutics-in-病人-with-primary-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-analyzes-the-use-of-tissue-agnostic-therapeutics-in-病人-with-primary-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60c4297c-0e07-44e7-a0ab-8b15df363bcc Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:36:48 -0500 Study analyzes the use of tissue-agnostic therapeutics in patients with primary brain tumors
新发现揭示了一种罕见骨骼疾病的遗传基础麦吉尔领导的研究小组取得了一项重要发现，揭示了一种罕见骨骼疾病的遗传基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-discovery-sheds-light-on-the-genic-basis-of-a-rare-skeletal-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-discovery-sheds-light-on-the-genic-basis-of-a-rare-skeletal-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd5ba317-27d1-491c-9cd3-5f4916194ea4 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:11:50 -0500 New discovery sheds light on the genetic basis of a rare skeletal disorder

人工智能模型揭示记忆如何融合现实与想象伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，生成人工智能的最新进展有助于解释记忆如何使我们能够了解世界、重温旧经验并为想象力和规划构建全新的经验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-model-unveils-how-memories-blend-reality-and-imagination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-model-unveils-how-memories-blend-reality-and-imagination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=736a1b5e-5b2a-450c-b4c2-cc052fd0148b Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:48:00 -0500 AI model unveils how memories blend reality and imagination
细菌的“自杀式”免疫系统增强了抗生素对抗霍乱的功效细菌有一个免疫系统，可以保护它们免受称为噬菌体的病毒的侵害。来自蒂宾根大学和维尔茨堡大学的一个研究小组现在展示了这种免疫系统如何增强特定抗生素对抗霍乱病原体霍乱弧菌的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Bacterias-suicidal-immune-system-boosts-antibiotic-power-against-cholera.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Bacterias-suicidal-immune-system-boosts-antibiotic-power-against-cholera.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5f4d65c-ca58-4fd9-83c0-40b94d0e0c03 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:25:24 -0500 Bacteria's "suicidal" immune system boosts antibiotic power against cholera
